channel.title: git on A fractal spectrum of tales
channel.description: Recent content in git on A fractal spectrum of tales

item.title: Git workflow for lazy mathematicians
item.description: First of all, what is git? Citing its website Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency. [It] is easy to learn and has a tiny footprint with lightning fast performance. In other words Git provides a source control repository that enables you to roll back code changes as needed, to merge the updates when collaborating with others and eventually to have an online backup of your work.
